title: Three More Actors Added to Game of Thrones Season 6 as Sam Tarly’s Family
content:
When we last saw Sam in Game of Thrones, he was taking Gilly and her baby from The Wall for the safety of Oldtown. With the HBO series now overtaking George R.R. Martin’s novels, what’s to come in season six remains a mystery, but we’re clearly going to be meeting Sam’s family as three actors have 

The post Three More Actors Added to Game of Thrones Season 6 as Sam Tarly’s Family appeared first on HeyUGuys. » 

- Josh Wilding
